title: Online share of retail trade in selected countries 2014 to 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 12 different Countrys on X-axis for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of retail trade.
For Country United Kingdom, 2017 had the highest Share of retail trade 178.0 among the 5 groups and in Switzerland, 2014 had the lowest Share of retail trade 0.0.
The maximum Share of retail trade for 2018 that was found in Country United Kingdom was 5.24 times larger than the minimum Share of retail trade observed in Country Italy.
On average, the Country United Kingdom had the highest Share of retail trade for all 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018. Whereas Italy had the lowest average Share of retail trade.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of retail trade on the Y-axis for 12 different Countrys for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
For Country United Kingdom, 2017 had the highest Share of retail trade 178.0 among the 5 groups and in Switzerland, 2014 had the lowest Share of retail trade 0.0.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 12 different Countrys on X-axis for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of retail trade.
For Country United Kingdom, 2017 had the highest Share of retail trade 178.0 among the 5 groups and in Switzerland, 2014 had the lowest Share of retail trade 0.0.
Among all the Countrys, 2018 had the highest Share of retail trade in Country United Kingdom and lowest Share of retail trade in Country Italy.
The maximum Share of retail trade for 2018 that was found in Country United Kingdom was 5.24 times larger than the minimum Share of retail trade observed in Country Italy.
Among all 5 groups, 2017 had the gap of 168.0 between the maximum and minimum Share of retail trade observed in Country United Kingdom and France respectively.
2017 had the maximum Share of retail trade out of all 5 groups in Country United Kingdom followed by 2017 in United Kingdom, and the minimum Share of retail trade is found for 2014 in Switzerland.
Averaging all 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018, the Country United Kingdom is the maximum Share of retail trade and Italy is the minimum Share of retail trade.
